title: What are the best insults/roasts you've seen in LoL?

replies.body:
{{champion:56}} "Ezreal you haven't hit a single skillshot in the past 15 minutes!" 
{{champion:81}} "Muted"
{{champion:56}} "Hope you don't miss the mute button too"

"I'm going to mute you"
Because half the time they don't even mute you and just want a reaction.

your so TRASH that the trashman committed.
your family tree must be a cactus because you are one big prick.
yamom ganks bot.
3v1 like we did with yamom.
you know ill rappe you just ask yamom.
you spend as much time in that bush as yamom did at the wine festival.
your add in the daily murcury...cheapest prices ive ever seen you must really be TRASH!.----- i suppose i should have known given the experience i had with yamom.
hmm so many chances to beat me...excerebrose zounderkite

almost all trash talk can be thrown back if you the first to use yamom insults own yamom. yamom will comeback at almost any comment. your trash-yamoms trash.  nice toaster- yeah its yamoms.    stop feeding-what yamom with ma dik.   your feeding-well i feed yamom everynight. in the world of trash talk and insults yamom will take you beyond.
I can't say but it involves Morgana's black shield not being able to help them in a way. Use your imagination based on what it does. ;)
